data.text: “Arariba dagarvazima, kɨ nɨsi,
Ia araribar dagarvaziba baragh.
An onɨmaribagh amima,
Ezɨ e gɨn orazi, a pamten dɨa mɨgei, ezɨ e an gavgavim barasi.
“Godɨn tiarim, mati ararim dagarvasi,
A mɨgeima aisɨn amozim nguazim giri.
Arazir kamɨn, a gumazamizibar amutɨ me ingaran kogham.
Dughiar kamɨn asɨzir atiaba,
Amɨnir gavgaviba uan danganibar ikegha izi.
God uan akatorimɨn amɨnim giverazɨ ais otifi.
A dɨpar avɨrim isa ghuariar ekiabar aven da akufi,
God uabɨ mɨgeima, ghuariaba ighuagha arui.
God kamaghsua amozim amadi, dughiar maba a gumazamizibar arazir kuraba akɨrasa,
“Jop, nɨ kuarim atɨgh nɨmɨra ikɨ puram oragh,
God Akar Gavgavim ghuariabagh anɨngizɨ, onɨmariba dar aven ikia taghtagha tintinibar zui.
God overiamɨn ghuariaba guizɨ, da pura guighav iti.
Nɨ korotiam aruzɨ, amɨnir fefer sautɨn amadaghan izim nɨ gamima,
God overiamɨn ingarigha, a isa an danganimɨn anetɨzɨ, a ikia gavgafi.
En nɨghnɨziba derazir puvatɨ, mati e mɨtatemɨn aven iti,
God oraghtɨ, kɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨam an ikɨtɨ, a ti kuarim atɨgh na baragham, o?
“Amɨnim ghuariabagh ivarazɨ, overiam bar zuegha itima,
Nɨ gan, Notɨn amadaghan angazangarir ekiam overiamɨn oto,
Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, a bar pɨn iti,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazamiziba an atiati.
